short_summary: Learning Advisors, Designers, and Project Managers for ESDC expertise positions. Fully accessible instructional materials required.
description: Expertise design and development for the expertise positions at ESDC with the inclusion of Learning Advisors, Designers, and Project Managers. the design, development of fully accessible Instructional materials according to established processes.
full_summary:
# College@ESDC National Learning Roadmap for Expertise

## Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** cb-546-24259411
* **Solicitation Number:** 100024396
* **Procurement Category:** SRV (Services)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive Selective Tendering
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **UNSPSC Code:** 80111504 (Labor Training or Development)

## Project Overview

The College@ESDC is seeking a service provider to contribute to the National Learning Roadmap for Expertise at ESDC. Specifically, the selected vendor will:

* Identify position-specific functions and related skills
* Design instructional materials and blueprints for Business and Program expertise positions
* Develop fully accessible materials according to established processes

## Tender Requirements

* The successful bidder will be responsible for delivering high-quality services that meet the requirements outlined above.
* The services will be rendered in accordance with the laws and regulations of Canada.
* The contractor is expected to have expertise in labor training and development.

## Tender Submission

* The tender submission deadline is **23 October 2023, 14:00:00**.
* Interested suppliers must submit their proposals electronically through the Canada Buys platform.
* A copy of the tender notice can be accessed through the following links:
	+ English: [link to attachment](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20708/100024396-npp-en_0.pdf)
	+ French: [link to attachment](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20708/100024396-npp-fr.pdf)

## Contact Information

For any questions or concerns related to this RFP, please contact:

* **Yves Cormier**
* Email: [nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca](mailto:nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (438) 462-8563

______

Note:
* I formatted the text using markdown and ensured that English is consistently used and accessible.
* The rewritten text includes all the relevant information from the original shared document.
* I only included 400 words or less as per your request.
* Redundant and irrelevant information was omitted to create a more professional and concise text.
* French is not included here since it's acceptable in a bilingual setting and English is the majority language in where
